thread.title: Public Accounting Firm Louis Plung & Co. Hires New Audit Manager
thread.title_full: Public Accounting Firm Louis Plung & Co. Hires New Audit Manager

author: Julia Germeyer
title: Public Accounting Firm Louis Plung & Co. Hires New Audit Manager
text:
Cynthia W. Taylor, CPA joined the management team at Louis Plung & Company on October 12, 2015 in the role of Audit & Assurance Manager. In this position, she will manage accounting and audit services for several of the firm’s corporate and non-profit clients. Taylor’s audit practice primarily is focused on non-profit organizations as well as construction, manufacturing, and employee benefit plans. Taylor recently relocated to Pittsburgh from the Washington, D.C. area, where she worked for one of the largest public accounting firms in Baltimore. Richard Fischer , head of the Audit & Assurance Department at Louis Plung & Company, commented that “Cynthia’s experience and background complement our knowledge in several key industries. I’m looking forward to her contributions and know she’ll be a great addition to our audit team.”
In addition to providing audit services to non-profits, Taylor regularly gives back to the community. Past volunteer experience includes the Ronald McDonald House Red Shoe Crew, United Way of Central Maryland, and Dyslexia Tutoring Program, for which she recently served as Treasurer of the Board of Directors. Taylor is also a member of the American Institute of Certified Public Accountants (AICPA) and the Pennsylvania Institute of Certified Public Accountants (PICPA). She earned her Bachelor’s degree in Accounting from Pennsylvania State University.
About Louis Plung & Company, LLP
Louis Plung & Company, LLP is among the largest locally owned certified public accounting firms in the Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania region. Although based in Pittsburgh, the firm’s geographic focus also includes New York, Ohio, Washington, D.C., and many other states. Louis Plung & Company delivers personalized service to clients in the real estate development, construction, retail, wholesale, employee benefit plan, non-profit, and manufacturing industries. In 2011, the firm co-founded FVL, a joint venture that specializes in forensic accounting and valuations.
Louis Plung & Company is a member of the AICPA and PICPA . The firm also belongs to BKR International, an independent association with member firms in more than 70 countries. More information about Louis Plung & Company, its partners, and services can be found on their website at http://www.louisplung.com .
